|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 200 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = SST;39VF800A-70-4C-EK; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 4 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4F151612C-TC60; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = LevelOne;LXT970AQC; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = 00:60:B3 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = PCMCIA (16-bit) |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = 1 |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, DE-9,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = b |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = public |defaultssid = RangeLAN |defaultssid_regex = ^RangeLAN$ |default_ch = |manuf = Samsung |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Korea |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Z-Com XI-300 |rad1modif = PCMCIA (16-bit) |rad1chip1 = Harris;HFA3841; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;; |rad1chip3 = Intersil;; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = unknown |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device uses a ''RangeLAN-DS PC Card'' for the wireless module. :It will also work with a [[Proxim Harmony 8430]] (same [[Z-Com XI-300|parent OEM product]]). This device is highly similar in appearance to the [[Samsung SWL-3000AP]] and appears :to share the same serial configuration interface. ''Samsung'' is the presumed OEM. The CPU is part S3C4510X01-QERO. There is a ''Lattice'' ispLSI5256VA on-board. "REV:AP3000B" and "2000.05.23" is silkscreened on the board. :This device has no web configuration interface. The power adapter included with the device is a :'''Ault''' Model PW 107 KA0502F02 (5V, 1.5A). ===Serial=== The default password for the serial console is '''public'''. ====Boot log==== 
        AP Firmware version : 1.02
        Checksum OK
        Loading firmware

        ===================================================
                 Proxim AP Configuration Utility
        ===================================================

        To configure the Access Point, the password is required.
        Enter password:

        ===================================================
                 Proxim AP Configuration Utility
        ===================================================

        To configure the Access Point, the password is required.
        Enter password:******

        ===================================================
                 Proxim AP Configuration Utility
        ===================================================

        [ ROOT ]
              1. Basic                 [Menu]
              2. Advanced              [Menu]
              3. Server                [Menu]
              4. Status                [Menu]
              5. Load default values
              6. Save and reboot

        CMD(t,p,h):
